title: Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd marketing website (responsive, branded, SEO-ready)

requirements.summary: Build a responsive 4-page marketing site with navigable Home, Services, About, and Contact sections/pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Site has at least 4 navigable sections/pages: Home, Services, About, Contact.
Navigation works on desktop and mobile (mobile menu/collapsible nav is acceptable).
All pages are responsive and readable on common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop).

file_operations.description: Create the main app shell with routing between Home, Services, About, and Contact, and shared layout (header/footer). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., navigation button/link styling, mobile menu such as Sheet/Drawer if available) to compose a responsive header navigation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create Home page content sections (hero, highlights, CTA) designed for responsive layout and clear branding. Compose with shadcn-ui components such as Card/Button where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Services page scaffold and wire in the services list section (cards/grid). Compose with shadcn-ui components such as Card; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create About page describing the business in English with professional tone and responsive typography/layout. Compose with shadcn-ui components for consistent section styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create Contact page scaffold with prominent contact details and optional simple contact CTA content (no integrations). Compose with shadcn-ui components for consistent layout (e.g., Card); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create reusable header with logo, brand name, and responsive navigation (desktop links + mobile collapsible menu). Use shadcn-ui components to implement accessible menu interactions/styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create reusable footer with logo, quick links, and contact details. Use shadcn-ui components/typography utilities for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Show phone and email prominently on Contact page and in the footer, with clickable tel/mail links.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows phone number and email address exactly as provided.
Footer contains the same phone number and email address.
Phone is clickable as a tel: link and email is clickable as a mailto: link.

file_operations.description: Add prominent contact info blocks displaying Phone: 9053146001 and Email: inkhiya14@gmail.com exactly, with tel: and mailto: links. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) to present info clearly; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Include the same phone number (9053146001) and email (inkhiya14@gmail.com) in the footer with tel: and mailto: links. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent link/button styling if applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a Services section listing common pest control categories with short English descriptions in a scannable layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Services section lists at least 5 service categories with short descriptions.
Text is in English and formatted for easy scanning (cards or a simple grid/list).

file_operations.description: Implement a services grid/list (at least 5 categories) with short English descriptions (e.g., general pest control, termite, cockroach, rodent, mosquito, bed bug). Use shadcn-ui Card (and related) components for a clean scannable layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a brief services preview section on Home that links/navigates to the full Services page. Use shadcn-ui components (Card/Button) for consistent CTA styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add basic SEO and sharing metadata using the business name in title and Open Graph tags.
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab title includes “Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd”.
A meta description exists and is relevant to pest control services.
Open Graph title and description tags are present.

file_operations.description: Add/ensure document title includes “Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd”, add a relevant meta description for pest control services, and include Open Graph title/description meta tags using the business name.

requirements.summary: Create and apply a cohesive professional theme (non blue/purple primary) across typography, colors, spacing, and component styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across navigation, buttons, headings, and section layouts.
Primary palette is not blue/purple-dominant (unless used only as minor accents).
Site looks professionally branded and not like default template styling.

file_operations.description: Create global styles and Tailwind base layer theme tokens (CSS variables used by shadcn-ui) with a professional pest-control palette (e.g., greens/earth tones with orange accent), consistent typography, spacing, and section styling. Ensure primary is not blue/purple-dominant. Compose shadcn-ui components rather than editing them; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions if needed to support the new brand palette/typography/spacing utilities consistently (without making blue/purple the primary).

Apply the new theme consistently to navigation states (active/hover), button styles, and spacing using Tailwind utilities + shadcn-ui composition; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply the new theme consistently to footer layout, typography, and link styles using Tailwind utilities + shadcn-ui composition; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images as static assets and use logo in header/footer and hero image on Home.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Logo is rendered in the header and footer.
Hero image is rendered on the Home page without loading via the backend.

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo image asset at exactly frontend/public/assets/generated/nexeme-logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure it is referenced as a static asset (not via backend).
Add the generated hero banner asset at exactly frontend/public/assets/generated/nexeme-hero.dim_1600x900.png and ensure it is referenced as a static asset (not via backend).

Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nexeme-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header alongside the business name, with responsive sizing and accessible alt text. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent layout if applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nexeme-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer with appropriate sizing and accessible alt text. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent layout if applicable; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nexeme-hero.dim_1600x900.png in the Home hero section with responsive behavior (e.g., aspect/cover) and accessible alt text. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent CTA styling near the hero; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
